title: Daddy's Little Girl
description: Brennan von Däniken was content with his life.After many centuries he had built a good reputation in the vampire community,owns vampire clubs in the NW.Leave it to a six foot red headed human with haunting green eyes and a mischievous smirk to turn his seemingly perfect life upside down.The moment Brennan watched Nik stab a pencil into the shoulder of one of his club patrons that was fighting with her vampire brother, he knew that he could love the strange vampire excepting girl.The only problem, aside from her being human and the fact that her blood is calling out to Brennan to the likes of nothing he’s ever known, her father is the Russian Mafia Boss controlling the criminal underground from Northern California to British Columbia,plus the entire East Coast,the Immortal Hunters that are after her for unknown reasons,and the assassins trying to kill her.Is Brennan’s love for Nik strong enough to keep him from killing her?
author: Danae Ayusso
